entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3 except low minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3 except low minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 09 January 2023
